text: Need Peyton Stewart for Priceline campaign. Budget around $3,778, looking for 1 x Store opening, 1 x 60-second YouTube video, 1 x Instagram story, 2 x 5-minute review, 2 x Media interview. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
